item.title: Normal Map - The Magic of Light and Shadow
item.description: Brief speaking, the technology of a normal map is to convert the corresponding picture into small mirrors with different colors and angles.

item.title: Easy way to evaluate HCT inference of glucose meters
item.description: Everyone has a different hematocrit (HCT), and the measurement of the blood glucose meter may be affected by HCT.
